document_data.name: Rhaumon Bloodaxe
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhaumon Bloodaxe''', also just called '''Bloodaxe''', was one of the earliest known leaders of [[Ruathym]].
document_data.Possessions: Bloodaxe fought with two magical items, the [[battleaxe]] named after him, the ''[[Bloodaxe]]'', and the ''[[Redshield]]''.
document_data.History: Rhaumon took leadership during the turbulent times of Ruathym's history, and acquired the title of [[First Axe]]. He lived in a mansion that bordered the sea, and after he passed on, was buried in this exact place. After his death, the mansion was fiercely guarded by [[undead]] beings.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It is said that Rhaumon Bloodaxe never fully left his waterfront home. Rumor had it that only fully loyal inhabitants of Ruathym could stay the night there without harm coming to them.
